attributes.action: Change the '2012 Olympics London' logo to something more fitting of this great nation
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The proposed 2012 Olympic logo unveiled today which is costing the British tax payer a staggering £400,000 is nothing short of hideous.

This great nation deserves a more! The logo will be used worldwide as an ambassador of the United Kingdom.

Sign the petition and voice your concern. We deserve better!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
